entries.name: Definitely Maybe
entries.quote: You and I are gonna live forever…

entries.name: Morning Glory
entries.quote: Today is gonna be the day…

entries.name: Dont Look Back in Anger
entries.quote: Wipe that tear away now from your eye.

entries.name: All Sparks
entries.quote: You're answering questions, That have not yet been asked.

entries.name: Papillon
entries.quote: It kicks like a sleep twitch!

entries.name: Smokers Outside the Hospital Doors
entries.quote: Someone turn us around, can we start this again?

entries.name: Eat Raw Meat = Blood Drool
entries.quote: If you’re afraid of what you need… look around you, you’re surrounded.
